price: 24. Heeft het verhaal van de edele gasten van Ibraahiem jullie bereikt?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīthu ḍayfi ib'rāhīma al-muk'ramīna
